name: Synaptic Pulse, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: You emit a pulsating mental blast that stuns all creatures in range of your psychic shriek for 1d4 rounds. On a successful save, a creature is instead sickened for 1 round.
area_zh: ：以你为中心，半径30尺扩散区域
text_zh: 你放射出一股精神冲击波，范围内的所有生物都会由于你的精神尖啸而震慑（stuns）1d4轮。成功通过豁免的生物会恶心（sickened）1轮以替代上述效果。
